枖字的基本解释

枖
yǎo
古书上说的一种树。

枖
yāo
〔枖枖〕古同“夭夭”，茂盛：“桃之枖枖。”

枖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yāo］
［《廣韻》於喬切，平宵，影。］
见“枖枖”。

枖字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　枖； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页516第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】於喬切【正韻】伊堯切，?音妖。【說文】枖，木少盛貌。【詩·周南】桃之枖枖。《詩》本作夭。徐曰：謂草木始生，未幾得地力而先長也。【書·禹貢】厥草惟夭。【註】物越衆而速大，故亦謂短折者爲夭也。　又【集韻】於兆切，音夭。木名。　又【類篇】於兆切。木華茂也。　【集韻】通作夭。或作?。

枖字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
枖字的起名意思

古书上说的一种树。

Basic explanation of words
Nai
yǎo
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books.
Nai
yāo
〔枖枖] Gu Tong "Yaoyao", luxuriant: "Peach Zhimo."

[①]［yāo］
["Guangyun" Yu Qiaoqie, Ping Xiao, shadow. ]
See "Nano".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　枖; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 516 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Yu Qiaoqie [Zheng Yun] Yi Yaoqie, a sound demon. [Said the text] Nao, Mu Shaosheng looks. 【Poetry·Zhou Nan】The peach blossoms. "Poetry" is written by Yao. Xu said: It is said that the vegetation begins to grow, and it grows before it gets the ground. 【Book·Yugong】Juicao Weiyao. [Note] The larger the crowd, the quicker things increase, so it is also said that the short-breaker is Yaoya.　[Jiyun] Yu Zhaoqie, Yinyao. Wooden name.　[Classes] Yu Zhaoqie. Mu Huamao also.　【Jiyun】Tong Zuoyao. Or for?.
